full_text: RT @AP: Six Dr. Seuss books — including “And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street” and “If I Ran the Zoo” — will stop being published…

localize.full_text: RT @AP: 六本苏斯博士的书--包括《我在桑树街看到的》和《如果我开动物园》--将停止出版... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 六本苏斯博士的书--包括 "想想我在桑树街看到了它 "和 "如果我跑了动物园"--将停止出版，因为种族主义和不敏感的图像，保存和保护作者遗产的业务说。https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0。

localize.full_text: RT @AP: 六本蘇斯博士的書--包括《我在桑樹街看到的》和《如果我開動物園》--將停止出版... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 六本蘇斯博士的書--包括 "想想我在桑樹街看到了它 "和 "如果我跑了動物園"--將停止出版，因爲種族主義和不敏感的圖像，保存和保護作者遺產的業務說。https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0。

retweeted_status.full_text: Six Dr. Seuss books — including “And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street” and “If I Ran the Zoo” — will stop being published because of racist and insensitive imagery, the business that preserves and protects the author's legacy said. https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0
